newsitem.title: USA: Gates says NT 5.0 to enter beta this fall.
newsitem.headline: Gates says NT 5.0 to enter beta this fall.

text.p: Microsoft Corp Chairman Bill Gates said on Tuesday that the 5.0 version of Windows NT would enter beta testing this fall and go to final release in the first half on 1998.

"We will be in Beta this fall," said Gates, who noted that copies of the next-generation operating system software have already been given out to developers. "Then we'll go to final release of NT in the first half of next year."
Making a keynote presentation at the Spring Comdex trade show, here, Gates told an audience of about 3,500 that Windows NT ranked as Microsoft's most important product from a strategic standpoint.
